00019 namespace ldmx {
00020 
00021     void UserTrackingAction::PreUserTrackingAction(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00022 
00023         int trackID = aTrack->GetTrackID();
00024 
00025         if (trackMap_.contains(trackID)) {
00026             if (trackMap_.hasTrajectory(trackID)) {
00027                 // This makes sure the tracking manager does not delete the trajectory.
00028                 fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(true);
00029             }
00030         } else {
00031             // New track so call the process method.
00032             processTrack(aTrack);
00033         }
00034 
00035         // Activate user plugins.
00036         pluginManager_->preTracking(aTrack);
00037     }
00038 
00039     void UserTrackingAction::PostUserTrackingAction(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00040 
00041         // Activate user plugins.
00042         pluginManager_->postTracking(aTrack);
00043 
00044         // Save extra trajectories on tracks that were flagged for saving during event processing.
00045         if (dynamic_cast<UserTrackInformation*>(aTrack->GetUserInformation())->getSaveFlag()) {
00046             if (!trackMap_.hasTrajectory(aTrack->GetTrackID())) {
00047                 storeTrajectory(aTrack);
00048             }
00049         }
00050 
00051         // Set end point momentum on the trajectory.
00052         if (fpTrackingManager->GetStoreTrajectory()) {
00053             auto traj = dynamic_cast<Trajectory*>(fpTrackingManager->GimmeTrajectory());
00054             if (traj) {
00055                 if (aTrack->GetTrackStatus() == G4TrackStatus::fStopAndKill) {
00056                     traj->setEndPointMomentum(aTrack);
00057                 }
00058             }
00059         }
00060     }
00061 
00062     void UserTrackingAction::storeTrajectory(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00063 
00064         // Create a new trajectory for this track.
00065         fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(true);
00066         Trajectory* traj = new Trajectory(aTrack);
00067         fpTrackingManager->SetTrajectory(traj);
00068 
00069         // Update the gen status from the primary particle.
00070         if (aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetPrimaryParticle() != NULL) {
00071             G4VUserPrimaryParticleInformation* primaryInfo = aTrack->GetDynamicParticle()->GetPrimaryParticle()->GetUserInformation();
00072             if (primaryInfo != NULL) {
00073                 traj->setGenStatus(((UserPrimaryParticleInformation*) primaryInfo)->getHepEvtStatus());
00074             }
00075         }
00076 
00077         // Map track ID to trajectory.
00078         trackMap_.addTrajectory(traj);
00079     }
00080 
00081     void UserTrackingAction::processTrack(const G4Track* aTrack) {
00082 
00083         // Set user track info on new track.
00084         if (!aTrack->GetUserInformation()) {
00085             auto trackInfo = new UserTrackInformation;
00086             trackInfo->setInitialMomentum(aTrack->GetMomentum());
00087             const_cast<G4Track*>(aTrack)->SetUserInformation(trackInfo);
00088         }
00089 
00090         // Check if trajectory storage should be turned on or off from the region info.
00091         UserRegionInformation* regionInfo = (UserRegionInformation*) aTrack->GetLogicalVolumeAtVertex()->GetRegion()->GetUserInformation();
00092 
00093         if (regionInfo && !regionInfo->getStoreSecondaries()) {
00094             // Turn off trajectory storage for this track from region flag.
00095             fpTrackingManager->SetStoreTrajectory(false);
00096         } else {
00097             // Store a new trajectory for this track.
00098             storeTrajectory(aTrack);
00099         }
00100 
00101         // Save the association between track ID and its parent ID for all tracks in the event.
00102         trackMap_.addSecondary(aTrack->GetTrackID(), aTrack->GetParentID());
00103     }
00104 }
